entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
